Home.mainText: Your Key to Decentralized Markets: Trade Without Limits
Home.joinTitle: Join the early phase of our token sale to secure profits
Home.joinSubtext: Utilize the calculator to estimate your future returns with minimal effort
Home.provideLiquiditySubtext: Become liquidity providers - stake your tokens in liquidity pools and earn on fees from swaps. Our dashboard will show you the most profitable options.
Home.swapSubtext: Swap one asset for another using our platform. We select the most cost-effective swap path for the user. Fast, safe, proven by experience, decentralised.
Home.wannaBuild: Wanna build on top of our infrastructure?

Points.title: Points
Points.howItWorksText1: xSwap Points are non-transferrable tokens awarded to early adopters for their engagement, such as swapping or providing liquidity. They're not just for reputation; they can also be utilized for various purposes, like rewards.
Points.howItWorksText2: The distribution of these points is calculated based on a straightforward mathematical model that is proportional to the volume users generate and the specific assets they utilize. For instance, XFI asset is the most advantageous to use in swaps and liquidity provision, leading to higher xSwap Point earnings. Engaging in fun strategies, such as making daily transactions in significant amounts, can elevate users to the status of top xSwap Points farmers.
Points.howItWorksShort: xSwap Points are non-transferrable tokens awarded to early adopters for their engagement, such as swapping or providing liquidity. They're not just for reputation; they can also be utilized for various purposes, like rewards.

WarningBanner.text1: Token sale is on TRON Network.
WarningBanner.mobileWarning: To enable full functionality of our dApp and to carry out transactions, please insert our website link into your TronLink app and continue using the application there.

TokenSale.EmailInfo: An email will be sent to this address notifying that you can claim your tokens on CrossFi Network
TokenSale.NetworkCostSuggestion: This gas calculation is only an estimation. Your wallet will set the price of the transaction. You can modify the gas settings directly from your wallet provider.
TokenSale.ProfitSuggestion: Liquidity pools will be established on the CrossFi Network, pairing SWA tokens with stablecoins. In these pools, SWA's price will be set three times higher than its presale value, targeting a 300% profit.
TokenSale.LearnHow: Learn how to earn a lot with our videoguide
TokenSale.Step2: How to Fund TRON Wallet via Binance
TokenSale.Step3: How to Fund TRON Wallet via Bybit
TokenSale.Step4: How to participate in token pre-sale

WrongNetwork.title: Please, switch network to CrossFi Chain

Swap.title: Swap
Swap.slippageDesc: Slippage is the difference between the expected and actual outcome of a trade.
Swap.highSlippageWarn: Slippage is very high. You can potentially lose
Swap.howToText: This DEX swap simplifies token exchanges: Connect your wallet, select the token pair (e.g., XFI and USDT), ensure sufficient funds, input the trade amount, and confirm. The exchange calculates the received tokens, and they're deposited directly into your wallet.
Swap.priceImpactWarn2: You will lose a big portion of your funds in this trade
Swap.bestPrice3: This route optimizes your total output by considering split routes, multiple hops, and the gas cost of each step.

tokenSelector.title: Select token
tokenSelector.unknownTokenText: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you purchase this token, you may not be able to sell it back.

pools.title: Pools
pools.pairDoesntExist: This pair does not exist, you will need to add liquidity to create it.

faucet.title: Faucet
faucet.description: To perform transactions on the CrossFi network, you need XFI, the native currency of this network. You can receive your tokens by clicking the button below.
faucet.limitWarn: Please note that there is a limit of 5 XFI per day to ensure fair access for all users.
